      could try to flatten it out somehow

8.30.19  10:55 pm   what's the difference between a jingle and a song? like where's the point where one can say "this isn't just a jingle, this is an actual song"?

      the best case scenario is if the listener is not really sure

8.30.19  10:38 pm   what do you think about the last thursdayism theory, which states that the universe was created last thursday?

      lame and fake. the universe will not be created until next thursday

8.30.19  10:22 pm   I dont know what to do with my life

      what are some of the things you've done before that you liked

8.30.19  10:16 pm   can u do a face reveal?

      never

8.30.19  10:06 pm   How to make fun of something someone did without having fun at their expense

      it has to be funny enough that the original person likes it

8.30.19  9:44 pm   Could you start doing Monday videos so your YouTube fan base doesn't start a riot outside your house or something 

      sure

8.30.19  9:38 pm   can you think of a chord that's not in any of the songs on this site?

     no

      if so, what is it?

8.30.19  9:34 pm   What is the purpose of the notes section

      to display some of the things i have written over the years

8.30.19  8:51 pm   what's the craziest idea you've had in the past week

      a week with 100 days

8.30.19  7:20 pm   Thoughts on blender and the transition from "straight lines and colored rectangles" (8.29.19  5:57 pm ) to more complex, hopefully even cooler, things

      wild and crazy, but blender may be only a very small piece of the picture. or who knows, maybe it will be the whole picture. we'll see what this thing can do

8.30.19  7:14 pm   I realized recently that your description of mount st. helens is something I should aspire to be (puppy dreamer, full of music, take no answers, etc). Do you strive to be mt. saint helens? Or are you already mount saint hs.?

      we all are

8.30.19  7:07 pm   what does it take to become the superhero the planet needs

      lots of water and sunlight

8.30.19  6:51 pm   Do you like lizards

      they're not as big as i feel they could be

8.30.19  5:54 pm   have you ever been a chicken?

      could have been. might have even been 2 chickens

8.30.19  5:10 pm   do capital letters exist in your vocabulary

      yes but do they in yours

8.30.19  5:06 pm   bill, i'd love to support your work and donate to you. but i have a few problems. paypal ceased all of its operations in my country a few years ago, so paypal is not an option. i don't earn enough for monthly payment so patreon is not a viable choice either (and to be honest i haven't checked if patreon is available in my country, i wouldn't be surprised if it's not). my only option is youtube. instead of downloading your content to my computer i watch them on youtube, almost daily. so i hope video views help you earn good money on youtube. you are great artist and thank you for all the great songs, videos.

      that's kind of you

8.30.19  5:06 pm   Hello Bill. Do you know who named the earth earth?

      could be the germans

8.30.19  5:05 pm   what are some good rituals i can do to put my baby to sleep

      it is not your job to put the baby to sleep. it is the baby's job to wake you up

      that is difficult because it is constantly changing location

      let me see

      listening to as much different music as possible

      change it

      11 dollars

      i'm not sure

      yes

      hundreds of new youtube videos come out every second

      i prefer the more masculine and manly petroleum pencil sharpener

      yes

8.30.19  3:06 pm   do you feel like changing your mind?

      yes

      questions

      that's not time sensitive. that question is as old as the stars

      you could try some cream

      on the chair
